mapper.insert: insert into member (m_email, m_password, m_image, m_nickname, m_registype) values (#{m_email},#{m_password},#{m_image},#{m_nickname},#{m_registype})
mapper.update: update member set m_password=#{m_password}, m_image=#{m_image}, m_nickname=#{m_nickname} where m_email=#{m_email}
mapper.select: select count(1) from member where m_email=#{m_email} and m_password=#{m_password}
